q_ch: 列出所有缝纫组的进度百分比。
q_en: List the progress percentage of all sewing groups

steps.sql: SELECT id, name FROM working_group WHERE type = 'sew';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID and name for all sewing groups

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) / SUM(planned_number) AS progress FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: Calculate the progress for each sewing group by summing the completed numbers and dividing by the planned numbers

response:
Sure thing! Here are the progress percentages for all Sewing Groups:

| Working Group      | Progress Percentage |
|--------------------|---------------------|
| Master Sewers      | 48.26%              |
| Skilled Sewers     | 38.04%              |
| Advanced Sewers    | 32.72%              |
| Premier Sewers     | 24.24%              |
| Elite Sewers       | 12.62%              |

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. 😄
